mapper.select: SELECT CALENDER_ID as calender_Id, TITLE as title, START_DATE as start_date, END_DATE as end_date, EMP_ID as emp_id, DEPT_ID as dept_id, TYPE_ID as type_id FROM SCHEDULE WHERE DEPT_ID = #{dept_id}

SELECT s.CALENDER_ID as calendarId, d.NAME as deptName, e.NAME as empName, e.POSITION as position, t.NAME as TypeName, s.START_DATE as startDate, s.END_DATE as endDate FROM SCHEDULE s JOIN EMPLOYEES e ON s.EMP_ID = e.EMP_ID JOIN DEPARTMENTS d ON s.DEPT_ID = d.DEPT_ID JOIN VACATION_TYPE t ON s.TYPE_ID = t.TYPE_ID
INSERT INTO SCHEDULE (calender_Id, title, start_date, end_date, emp_id, dept_id, type_id) VALUES (#{calender_Id}, #{title}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, #{emp_id}, #{dept_id}, #{type_id})
SELECT NVL(MAX(CALENDER_ID),0) FROM SCHEDULE
